thread.title: Travel disruption as Cardiff clears after Rugby World Cup match
thread.title_full: Travel disruption as Cardiff clears after Rugby World Cup match | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel disruption as Cardiff clears after Rugby World Cup match
text:
Tens of thousands of people have been queueing outside Cardiff central as they try to get home after tonight's Rugby World Cup match.
Arriva Trains Wales have been managing to move around 6500 people in an hour.
The travel pressure comes after a difficult day in the city with two key routes closed after emergency incidents.
Megan Boot reports.
Play video Last updated Wed 23 Sep 2015 Travel Wales Cardiff
